column4: hey, i cant upgrade my drake to edgy eft, some packages wont load.... what can i do??
What packages?
922 packages can't be upgraded?
Oh, you want to do 'sudo apt-get dist-upgrade'
not upgrade
Run this: gksudo "update-manager -c"
hit alt-f2, copy and paste that into the dialog that comes up
i dunno what to type in :) what i tryed from https://help.ubuntu.com/community/EdgyUpgrades didnt work
I told you what to type in
Press Alt-F2, put `gksudo "update-manager -c"` in the box that comes up
dooglus, it says it cannot install all available updates, and tells me to "sudo apt-get dist-upgrade"
Alright. Open a terminal (Applications->Accessories->Terminal) and run 'sudo apt-get dist-upgrade'
Is that doing anything?
the same it did last time, mb it will work now...
Do it. :)
will it take long? will those 686MB/697MB be downloaded now?
Yeah, they'll start downloading now
what kind of internet connection do you have?
cuz my traffic sux, its DSL, but connects with 20-80kb/s
It'll probably take about an hour or two to install after it's done downloading. :P
thx, i'll go get somthing to eat now )
